analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: [GMS Status] Stable momentum maintained the score at 37, signaling a Defensive regime. [Macro Root] While DXY (Dollar strength) is steady, VIX (Fear index) at 20.6 limits equity gains despite soft inflation data. [Risk/Reward] Credit spreads suggest caution, but surging Bitcoin and Gold signal a tactical shift toward alternative assets. [Conclusion] Maintain high cash reserves and wait for VIX to drop below 20 and market breadth to improve before increasing risk exposure.

reports.EN: [GMS Status] Stable momentum maintained the score at 37, signaling a Defensive regime. [Macro Root] While DXY (Dollar strength) is steady, VIX (Fear index) at 20.6 limits equity gains despite soft inflation data. [Risk/Reward] Credit spreads suggest caution, but surging Bitcoin and Gold signal a tactical shift toward alternative assets. [Conclusion] Maintain high cash reserves and wait for VIX to drop below 20 and market breadth to improve before increasing risk exposure.
reports.ES: [GMS] El impulso estable mantuvo el puntaje en 37, indicando un rÃ©gimen Defensivo. [Macro] Mientras el DXY (DÃ³lar/Liquidez) estÃ¡ estable, el VIX (Ãndice de miedo) en 20.6 limita las acciones tras datos de inflaciÃ³n dÃ©biles. [Riesgo] Los diferenciales de crÃ©dito sugieren cautela, pero el repunte en Bitcoin y Oro indica un flujo hacia activos alternativos. [ConclusiÃ³n] Mantenga liquidez y precauciÃ³n hasta que el VIX baje de 20 y mejore la amplitud del mercado para nuevas entradas.

reports.ID: [Status GMS] Momentum stabil menjaga skor tetap di 37, menandakan rezim Defensif. [Akar Makro] Meskipun DXY (kekuatan Dolar) stabil, VIX (indeks ketakutan) di 20,6 membatasi kenaikan saham pasca data inflasi yang melambat. [Risiko/Peringatan] Spread kredit menunjukkan kehati-hatian, namun lonjakan Bitcoin dan Emas menandakan pergeseran likuiditas ke aset alternatif. [Kesimpulan] Pertahankan posisi kas yang tinggi dan pantau penurunan VIX di bawah 20 serta perbaikan keluasan pasar sebelum masuk kembali.

reports.DE: [GMS-Status] Stabiles Momentum hielt den Score bei 37, was ein defensives Regime bestÃ¤tigt. [Makro] WÃ¤hrend der DXY (Dollarkurs) fest bleibt, begrenzt der VIX (Angstindex) von 20,6 das Kurspotenzial nach schwachen Inflationsdaten. [Risiko] Weite Kredit-Spreads mahnen zur Vorsicht, doch steigende Bitcoin- und Goldpreise deuten auf eine Umschichtung in alternative Sachwerte hin. [Fazit] Bleiben Sie defensiv mit hohem Cash-Anteil, bis der VIX unter 20 fÃ¤llt und die Marktbreite deutlich zunimmt.
reports.FR: [Statut GMS] Un momentum stable a maintenu le score Ã  37, confirmant un rÃ©gime DÃ©fensif. [Macro] Bien que le DXY (Dollar) soit stable, le VIX (Indice de peur) Ã  20,6 freine les actions malgrÃ© une inflation modÃ©rÃ©e. [Risque] Les spreads de crÃ©dit incitent Ã  la prudence, mais la hausse du Bitcoin et de l'Or suggÃ¨re une rotation vers les actifs alternatifs. [Conclusion] PrivilÃ©giez les liquiditÃ©s en attendant que le VIX passe sous 20 et que la largeur du marchÃ© s'amÃ©liore pour intervenir.
